# Workflows

Reusable workflow definitions and logic.

## Usage

To inject shared workflows:

```xml
<PropertyGroup>
  <EnableANcpLuaSharedWorkflows>true</EnableANcpLuaSharedWorkflows>
</PropertyGroup>
```

## What gets injected

Reference only.

<details> <summary><code>WorkflowFactory.cs</code> (injected)</summary>

```csharp
// <auto-generated/>
#nullable enable
// ...
```
</details>

<details> <summary><code>WorkflowRunner.cs</code> (injected)</summary>

```csharp
// <auto-generated/>
#nullable enable
// ...
```
</details>
